DmnXml: <definitions xmlns="https://www.omg.org/spec/DMN/20191111/MODEL/" namespace="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/dmn" name="definitions" id="definitions"><inputData id="input_name" name="name"><variable name="name" typeRef="string"/></inputData><decision id="decision" name="Greeting"><variable name="greeting" typeRef="string"/><informationRequirement><requiredInput href="#input_name"/></informationRequirement><literalExpression><text>"Hello " + name</text></literalExpression></decision></definitions>
